nodes.text: The palace stables of the Pijali monarchy on the Inner Rim planet Pijal were adjacent to to the Pijali palace. In 40 BBY, they served as the residence of the monarchy's Pijal varactyls, and workers to care for them. The Lord Regent of Pijal and some associates took varactyls out for riding, and they later returned the creatures to the stables.
The palace stables first appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
